Posts.EditableText: I created a verb cut; chop; hack  I now want to define each of these separately, but when I try to create 'chop' it autocompletes to cut; chop; hack.  It there a way to delete the original verb collection?
Posts.HTML: I created a verb cut; chop; hack I now want to define each of these separately, but when I try to create 'chop' it autocompletes to cut; chop; hack. It there a way to delete the original verb collection?

Posts.EditableText:
Sme reply as last time, almost.

If you are using the off-line editor, you will find a verb object (as opposed to a verb tab for this object) under the game object. You can delete that.

If on-line, no.
Posts.HTML:
Sme reply as last time, almost.

If you are using the off-line editor, you will find a verb object (as opposed to a verb tab for this object) under the game object. You can delete that.

If on-line, no.

Posts.EditableText: Thanks Pixie, I'm using the online, is the only option to fix this to start a new game file and write everything again? (Apologies for ignorance).
Posts.HTML: Thanks Pixie, I'm using the online, is the only option to fix this to start a new game file and write everything again? (Apologies for ignorance).

Posts.EditableText: There is no way you can do anything yourself. It may be that the site administrator can do it for you; you could try asking Alex. Obviously we are in a state of flux, which will not help.
